terms.label: Curricular Practical Training (CPT)
terms.description: Work authorization for eligible F-1 students while enrolled in a degree program.

terms.label: Optional Practical Training (OPT)
terms.description: Temporary employment authorization for eligible F-1 students in their field of study.

terms.label: STEM OPT Extension
terms.description: Additional OPT period for eligible STEM degree holders meeting program rules.

terms.label: Cap Gap
terms.description: Bridge period that may extend eligible F-1 status/work authorization when H-1B change of status is timely filed.

terms.label: H-1B
terms.description: Employer-sponsored nonimmigrant classification for specialty occupations.
